articles.title: Chicago White Sox ace Dylan Cease has no-hit bid spoiled with two out in ninth
articles.description: White Sox ace list his bid for a no-hitter when Luis Arraez singled for the Twins with two out in the ninth inning.
articles.content:
CHICAGO -- Dylan Cease came within one out of his first career no-hitter, and the streaking Chicago White Sox pounded the Minnesota Twins 13-0 on Saturday night.

articles.title: 'We've got better players': Georgia Bulldogs begin title defense with easy victory over Oregon Ducks
articles.description: Defending national champion Georgia might have lost 15 players to the NFL draft, but the No. 3 Bulldogs looked just fine in the first game of their title defense, blasting No. 11 Oregon 49-3 at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta on Saturday.

articles.description: Ciryl Gane overcame a second-round knockdown and rallied to finish Tai Tuivasa in Round 3 on Saturday in the UFC's first card in France.

articles.title: North Carolina, Appalachian State combine to score 62 in 4th in wild Tar Heels win
articles.description: North Carolina edged Appalachian State 63-61 on Saturday in a game where both teams combined for 62 points and 504 yards in the fourth quarter alone.

articles.description: SEC commissioner Greg Sankey says there is too much to do before the expanded College Football Playoff can take place and that every conference will have to get on the same page to make significant changes in a hurry.
articles.content:

articles.title: Petra Kvitova edges Garbiñe Muruguza in third-set tiebreaker to complete comeback, advance at US Open
articles.description: Petra Kvitova erased a pair of match points and converted her fourth to edge Garbiñe Muguruza and advance to the fourth round of the US Open, where she will face American Jessica Pegula.
articles.content:
